summary: White skin for khajiit characters and npc
descriptionHtml:
Hi, this mod was a request by \"Nighkomoro\". 

Last year I publish the mods \"Worldslayer\" and \"Argentum Fulmen\", and I used a white skin khajiit in my pics of the mod,this is an reedit of this skin

What is this mod?
A retexture of the skin of [size=4][color=red]ALL[/color] [/size]khajiits of Skyrim

Install/Unistall

Use NMM or add/delete the archives .dds in data/textures/actors/Character/khajiitmale - khajiitfemale

I strongly recomend use [color=green]RaceMenu[/color] mod of Expired

[color=orange]NOTICE[/color]

I did this mod by request, is a hobbie for me and I am not a designer or similar, if you don\'t like my mod, 
don\'t use it, you think can do better, maybe is true, go ahead and do it, you don\'t need my permission.
author: Micheero
